data.title: Drums
data.description: I've been playing drums since elementary school. I became the drum captain and band president of my world-traveling high school marching band. Also, I was in a couple heavy metal bands (see links below).

data.title: Gaming
data.description: I enjoy playing PC video games and help run a couple gaming communities. I maintain and administer our game servers and help run our community events. Currently, I mostly enjoy playing Mount & Blade Warband (NW + mods) and Overwatch.

data.title: Family
data.description: My family is very important to me. I love spending time with my Wife and Son. We enjoy going to the beach, watching TV Shows & Movies, and going out to stuff our faces with delicious food.

data.title: Coding
data.description: As shown in the Projects section above, I enjoy software development and coding for fun. My current project and goal is to sharpen my python skills by developing a python-based service monitoring application, called pyPatrol.

data.title: Tech Forums
data.description: I actively partcipate in and contribute to a couple of server and technology related forums. These communities revolve around the hosting industry and sharing server-related expertise.

data.title: Servers
data.description: I love to build, setup, administer, utilize, and experiment on Linux-based servers. I have a couple machines at home serving various purposes along with a slew of rented dedicated and virtual private servers performing other functions.
